name: Centurion

skills.name: Feed on Suffering
skills.raw_description: Attacks 1 enemy. Heals this Champion by 15% of the damage inflicted

skills.name: Freakish Resiliance
skills.raw_description: Heals this Champion by 30% of their MAX HP and places a 30% [Increase DEF] buff on this Champion for 2 turns

skills.name: Soul Possession
skills.raw_description: Exchanges remaining HP levels with a target enemy, then equalizes the HP of all allies

seo.description: Knight Revenant is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 22 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Disciples of the K'leth death cult, the Knights Revenant see themselves as vessels of the spirits of the dead of their order. They raid indiscriminately to capture slaves to support themselves and as ritual sacrifices. Upon initiation, devotees surrender their bodies to the spirits of dark warriors.

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Centurion is a rare def champion from the faction Knight Revenant doing void damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

structured_data.description: Member of the faction Knight Revenant, Centurion is a champion of Rare rarity and of Def type
